players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is dead. This is awful. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager, so I have no special abilities. I'll be observing everyone closely to see if anyone acts suspiciously."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found out he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "That's a lie, Alice. I'm a villager. Why are you trying to frame me?"

Bob: "I'm a villager and I'm just as confused as anyone. Alice claims Charlie is the mafioso, but Charlie denies it. We need more information or at least some kind of consensus. Does anyone else have anything to share?"
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I'm a villager. Why would she investigate me night 1 when there were other players? That makes no sense for a real detective."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Bob, trust me and vote Charlie out."

Alice was arrested
